8e0e6196-d29f-4011-bdb6-b659f617b7ca.description: Introduction to Coding is a full course that combines four micro-courses: Object-Oriented Programming, Programming in Java, Data Structures, and Relational Databases and SQL.
8e0e6196-d29f-4011-bdb6-b659f617b7ca.name: Introduction to Coding

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 90-hour Introduction to Coding course, powered by SkillStorm.
Complete final coding challenge and assesment.

2c35cc59-9399-4d5d-b639-96d7b9c50c2c.description: Migrate your tech skills to the Cloud! Amazon Web Services is one of the top Cloud providers in the world. Learn about AWS global infrastructure and the most in-demand AWS services. Prepare yourself to prove your knowledge in the foundations of AWS.
2c35cc59-9399-4d5d-b639-96d7b9c50c2c.name: Introduction to AWS

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 30-hour Introduction to AWS micro-course powered by SkillStorm

cc882d07-7199-47aa-9095-130da8acb306.description: With so many high-profile data breaches occurring every year, cyber security and information security professionals are in high demand. Time to put on that white hat and start beating criminals at their own game!
cc882d07-7199-47aa-9095-130da8acb306.name: Cyber Security and InfoSec

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 20-hour Cyber Security and InfoSec micro-course powered by SkillStorm

3cfb697c-04e6-4a99-8ad9-fc729ba620d0.description: Relational Databases and SQL is a 20-hour micro-quest that reviews how to store, manipulate, and query data in relational databases using SQL—one of the easiest languages you can use to read and write data since it uses plain English words and has limited keywords.
3cfb697c-04e6-4a99-8ad9-fc729ba620d0.name: Relational Databases and SQL

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 20-hour Relational Databases and SQL micro-course powered by SkillStorm

4674641e-c163-4410-b49f-94d610005900.description: Salesforce is a best-in-class customer relationship management (CRM) software. Powerful out-of-the-box features and robust custom application development through the Force.com platform. Learn the basics of the Salesforce platform, and get an introduction into coding with Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning.
4674641e-c163-4410-b49f-94d610005900.name: Introduction to Salesforce

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 30-hour Introduction to Salesforce micro-course powered by SkillStorm

c179d5c6-3cb3-47cc-b86d-934f291bd239.description: Programming in Java is a 20-hour micro-course that focuses on applications—including logic and code as well as algorithmic logic for sorting, searching, and other foundational problems. You'll also review technical concepts in an interview format and integrate and adapt code for larger applications.
c179d5c6-3cb3-47cc-b86d-934f291bd239.name: Programming in Java

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 20-hour Programming in Java micro-course powered by SkillStorm

617e8185-5373-458c-b116-ffe38f2c8449.description: Upskill your full-stack knowledge with the modern approach to developing Web applications. Learn the basics of building a UI with Angular. Develop a Java back-end with Spring Boot and a MySQL database and learn how to put it all together.
617e8185-5373-458c-b116-ffe38f2c8449.name: Full-Stack Java Development

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 30-hour Full-Stack Java Development course powered by SkillStorm

7ae03f0a-c07d-4f25-8313-41a6c522de5b.description: Data Structures is a 20-hour micro-course that focuses on the structures that organize and store data in memory so it can be used effectively and efficiently to solve problems. Lists, queues, maps, and sets are examples of what we'll cover.
7ae03f0a-c07d-4f25-8313-41a6c522de5b.name: Data Structures

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 20-hour Data Structures micro-course powered by SkillStorm

485adb8d-8bed-4ae8-b869-68353222a1be.description: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) is a 30-hour micro-course that reviews the foundation for the Java language. OOP is not just used in Java— it's used in almost every modern programming language, so learning it is your first step to becoming a software developer.
485adb8d-8bed-4ae8-b869-68353222a1be.name: Object-Oriented Programming

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 30-hour Object-Oriented Programming micro-course powered by SkillStorm

14f38f70-5c50-4e53-a8ee-9e38694fde7b.description: Build an enterprise-ready application with little-to-no code using the Pega platform! The model-driven, unified approach in Pega increases your productivity as a developer--allowing you to build more robust applications faster. Don't start from scratch, join the Pega community.
14f38f70-5c50-4e53-a8ee-9e38694fde7b.name: Introduction to Pega

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 30-hour Introduction to Pega micro-course powered by SkillStorm

b3f3cbbf-745b-4523-af43-116e110e5a46.description: ServiceNow is a cloud-based platform for streamlining ITSM and service management tasks within enterprise organizations. Learn how to leverage the platform, configure and customize an instance, the fundamentals of the ServiceNow user interface and scripting in ServiceNow with JavaScript.
b3f3cbbf-745b-4523-af43-116e110e5a46.name: Introduction to ServiceNow

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 20-hour Introduction to ServiceNow micro-course powered by SkillStorm

efe7018a-9488-49a7-bfc9-40f2a941161a.description: Ready to build the next groundbreaking mobile app that changes the world? Start developing apps with Android and iOS using Java and Swift. Learn how to leverage mobile APIs and deploy your apps to Google Play and the Apple App Store. In this course, you will learn the basics of mobile app development for both Android and Apple devices.
efe7018a-9488-49a7-bfc9-40f2a941161a.name: Mobile App Development

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 20-hour Mobile App Development micro-course powered by SkillStorm

1d8663b6-dfea-43fe-9b2d-e635fa95d7de.description: Welcome to the world of low-code software development with Appian. You will learn how Appian provides state of the art Business Process Management (BPM) tools to tackle the toughest workflows, drive innovation, and deliver value faster.
1d8663b6-dfea-43fe-9b2d-e635fa95d7de.name: Appian Associate Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 8-week, instructor-lead course.

3c1e3257-6c81-41c2-83f9-86ba332ea36c.description: In preparation for the AWS certification exam, this 4-week, asynchronous course will teach students about the foundation of the AWS infrastructure and basic cloud concepts through a guided, instructor-led approach.
3c1e3257-6c81-41c2-83f9-86ba332ea36c.name: AWS Cloud Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 9-week, instructor-lead course.

175e02f4-069e-4d01-928f-c1b350029204.description: Mastering cloud architecture design requires a strong foundation in IT concepts. In preparation for the AWS Certification exam, students learn the fundamentals of building IT infrastructure on AWS through a guided, instructor-led approach. Learn how to optimize the use of the AWS cloud by understanding how AWS services fit into cloud-based business solutions.
175e02f4-069e-4d01-928f-c1b350029204.name: AWS Solutions Architect Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 8-week, instructor-lead course.

be346a16-8053-47ab-ab9a-0d7e743d1f0f.description: This 4-week course prepares you for the two CompTIA A+ Core Series exams: Core 1 (220-1101) and Core 2 (220-1102). be346a16-8053-47ab-ab9a-0d7e743d1f0f.name: CompTIA A+

feed40d4-2099-4aa4-bd91-ab6f97d2d4b4.description: This 4-week course prepares you for the CompTIA Network+ certification exam. Gaining this certification shows that you have the specific skills that network professionals need in today’s networking environments.
feed40d4-2099-4aa4-bd91-ab6f97d2d4b4.name: CompTIA Network+

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 4-week, instructor-lead course.

7c39c44b-ecbc-4996-b50f-8b0d2435e3c3.description: This 4-week course prepares you for the CompTIA Security+ certification exam. Gaining this certification shows that you have the baseline skills necessary to perform core security functions and pursue an IT security career.
7c39c44b-ecbc-4996-b50f-8b0d2435e3c3.name: CompTIA Security+

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 4-week, instructor-lead course.

9cbffa8d-4f90-48c2-9f78-55c8d8f5d8af.description: Using Pega’s App Studio and Dev Studio, you will learn common application development tasks performed from the perspective of a non-technical Business Architect, gaining hands-on experience along the way. 9cbffa8d-4f90-48c2-9f78-55c8d8f5d8af.name: Pega Business Architect

bcd700b4-c86e-48ac-895f-a853f0491be0.description: This 8-week course is designed for system architects, software developers and other tech professionals in order to enhance their skills in robotic process automation (RPA) and workforce intelligence through this fully online course designed to prepare you for the Pega Certified Robotics System Architect exam.
bcd700b4-c86e-48ac-895f-a853f0491be0.name: Pega Robotics Architect

bfcba334-e3b2-4023-ab87-97eac3650497.description: This 8-week course prepares you to pass the Pega Certified System Architect exam by teaching core principles of application development on the low code Pega Platform.
bfcba334-e3b2-4023-ab87-97eac3650497.name: Pega System Architect
